desc: Polka Pop is India's first brand to serve naturally flavored sparkling water with zero calories and no added sugar. Supporting a sustainable lifestyle choice, this healthy drink is available in four flavors, i.e. lemon-lime, orange, peach, and cranberry. The fizz makes this the best mix for cocktails and mocktails.

layout.text:
A drink so good,
you go WTF?!*

India's first homegrown flavoured
Sparkling Water brand
